ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: ЕИБ - Рехабилитация, обновяване и изграждане на пречиствателни станции за отпадни води

BEI - Rehabilitación, modernización y construcción de plantas depuradoras de aguas residuales

EIP - Jätevesipuhdistamoiden rakentamiset, kunnostukset ja parannukset
BEI - Réfection, modernisation et construction de stations d'épuration
BEI - Rehabilitation, upgrading and construction of wastewater treatment plants
EIB - Rehabilitacija, nadogradnja i izgradnja postrojenja za pročišćavanje otpadnih voda
EBB - Szennyvíztisztító telepek felújítása, korszerűsítése és építése
BEI - Riabilitazione, modernizzazione e costruzione di impianti di trattamento delle acque reflue
EIB - Nuotekų valymo jrenginių remontas, atnaujinimas ir statyba

BEI - Riabilitazzjoni, tiġdid u bini ta' impjanti għat-trattament ta' l-ilma tad-drenaġġ
EIB - Herstel, modernisering en bouw van afvalwaterzuiveringsstations
EBI - Remont, modernizacja i budowa oczyszczalni ścieków
BEI - Reabilitação, actualização e construção de estações de tratamento de águas residuais
BEI - Reabilitare, modernizare şi construcţie de staţii de epurare a apelor uzate
EIB - Obnova, modernizácia a výstavba čistiarní odpadových vôd

EIB - Iståndsättning, modernisering och anläggning av reningsverk för avloppsvatten

TXT_MARK.P: Lilienthalstrasse 33, 34123 Kassel, Germany and Karkanias environmental technology s.a.,

Laws of BiH and Financing Agreement between European Investment Bank, Bosnia and Herzegovina, and Republic of Srpska, for the Project, dated 22 September 2010 and ratified by the decision of the House of Representatives and House of Peoples of the Parliamentary Assembly Number: 01,02-05-2-293/11 dated 28 July 2011, by this Decision and Article V 3. 6) of the Constitution of Bosnia and Herzegovina, Presidency of Bosnia and Herzegovina at the 11th regular session, held on 24 August 2011, decided to ratify financing agreement between Bosnia and Herzegovina and the Republic of Srpska and the European investment Bank (BiH Official Gazette-International Agreements, no.6/11).
